name: Saint Bernadine Mission Communications Inc.
description:
Saint Bernadine Mission Communications Inc. is a BC owned and operated communications firm that cheerfully offers flexibility, experience and creativity without the high margins you’ll find at one of the behemoths. 
Over the years, we’ve developed strategies and helped create many brand touch points for various companies. The one thing that all these had in common was that they were creative solutions that followed through on a core strategic vision to deliver a single-minded marketing and communication idea.
